Text: Thx for this was always wondering what this was about, is there only one season

so far only one season and an OVA.
2nd season is said to be in the works.
Thanks a lot for the file.
would be great if more people seeded.

Just so everyone knows, this torrent features the censored version of the show. 

Here's a pic showing what I'm talking about: http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/6608/ggvshorriblesubscensors.png

The bottom right is what this version looks like, and the big picture is the lovely, uncensored original.
